episode.title: 坊ちゃんとアリスと魔界の一夜
The Duke, Alice, and a Night in the Witches` World
Bocchan to Alice to Makai no Ichiya
episode.summary: The night of the blood moon has arrived, and Cuff and Zain show up at the Duke’s mansion to take him to the witches’ sabbath. What will he do if he finds the witch that cursed him there? Source: Funimation
